name: HTML
description: Markup language for structuring web content like headings and images.
title: Markup Language

name: CSS
description: Styles web pages, controlling layout, colors, and fonts.
title: Styling Language

name: JavaScript
description: Adds interactivity and dynamic features to web pages.
title: Scripting Language

name: React
description: Library for building reusable UI components and managing state.
title: UI Library

name: Vue.js
description: Framework for building UIs and single-page applications easily.
title: JavaScript Framework

name: Bootstrap
description: Framework for responsive, mobile-first web design with pre-built components.
title: CSS Framework

name: Sass
description: CSS preprocessor that adds variables and nesting for better styling.
title: CSS Preprocessor

name: TypeScript
description: Typed JavaScript for enhanced code quality and error checking.
title: Type-Safe JavaScript

name: Webpack
description: Bundler for compiling JavaScript and other assets for optimized performance.
title: Build Tool

name: Gulp
description: Automates development tasks like minification and live-reloading.
title: Task Runner
